Class ServerController

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.cmput301w13t11.FoodBook.controller.ServerController

public class ServerController
extends java.lang.Object

Controller for UI objects that wish to utilize the application's online functionality.

Author:
Marko

hasConnection

public boolean hasConnection()
Check if the application is connected to the server. TODO: is this code dead?

Returns:
true if connected, false otherwise

uploadRecipe

public ServerClient.ReturnCode uploadRecipe(Recipe recipe)
Upload the given Recipe to the server.

Parameters:
recipe - The Recipe to be uploaded.
Returns:
ReturnCode.ERROR if anything goes wrong, ReturnCode.ALREADY_EXISTS if a recipe by that name already exists on the server (this will eventually be modified to check against URI instead of Recipe title), ReturnCode.SUCCESS if the recipe was successfully uploaded, ReturnCode.BUSY if the server does not respond within a fixed time.

searchByIngredients

public ServerClient.ReturnCode searchByIngredients(java.util.ArrayList<Ingredient> ingredients)
Performs a search using the passed list of Ingredients as the search terms -- will return recipes which contain a subset of the passed ingredients.

Parameters:
ingredients - The ingredients which we would like to include in the search term.
Returns:
NO_RESULTS on a search that yields no results, BUSY if the server does respond in time, ERROR should something go wrong during the attempt to search, SUCCESS on a successful search.

searchByKeywords

public ServerClient.ReturnCode searchByKeywords(java.lang.String keywords)
Calls the searchByKeywords() method of ServerClient.

Parameters:
keywords - The keywords by which the search should be performed.
Returns:
ReturnCode.ERROR if anything goes wrong, ReturnCode.NO_RESULTS if the search returned no results, ReturnCode.SUCCESS if the search was successful, in which case the results are written to the database and the observing views are notified.

uploadPhotoToRecipe

public ServerClient.ReturnCode uploadPhotoToRecipe(Photo photo,
                                                   long uri)
Calls the uploadPhotoToRecipe() method of ServerClient.

Parameters:
photo - The photo to be uploaded.
uri - the URI of the Recipe to which the photo is to be uploaded.
Returns:
ReturnCode.ERROR if anything goes wrong, ReturnCode.NOT_FOUND if he Recipe does not exist on the server, ReturnCode.SUCCESS if everything went okay.
